data.name: Rogue Agent
data.detailed_description:
Operation: ONLINE



Agents, now you are able to support the Rogue Agent Online development from the ground.

Meet the mission

https://www.patreon.com/rogueagentonline


About the Game

In a future war, the world is on the brink of a global force domination. This nations devised the final plan to restructure the order or to conquer it in their favor. They signed an agreement to activate their most lethal weapons: the Rogue Agents. They would reshape the world!

In-Game Drops Collection

Marketable/Tradable flags are random dropping during your playtime. These items can be applied to Item Showcase profile session and have no value in-game.

Features


  • Turn-based Fast-paced Rounding
  • Mouse And Keyboard Required
  • Agencies:
    • Brazil
    • China
    • United Kingdom
    • Russia
    • USA
  • Agent Attributes:
    • Accuracy
    • Evasion
    • Intelligence
    • Life Points
  • Locations Around the World:
    • Abuja (Nigeria)
    • Antananarivo (Madagascar)
    • Bucharest (Romania)
    • Buenos Aires (Argentina)
    • Caracas (Venezuela)
    • Doha (Qatar)
    • Havana (Cuba)
    • Hong Kong (China)
    • Jerusalem (Israel)
    • Kabul (Afghanistan)
    • Marrakesh (Marocco)
    • Mexico City (Mexico)
    • Sarajevo (Bosnia and Herzegovina)

Rules


Travel to locations and eliminate the targets around the world.

Two or more agents can choose the same mission. The combat will always be performed 1x1 and one attack per player on the current turn. The mission will be aborted for all agents who went into combat and both agents will travel back to the agency base.

If tree or five agent chose the same mission, the agent who traveled the longest distance between the previous location and the current mission location, will eliminate the target and successfully complete the mission.

Any agent will be disavowed if its life points hit zero or less. Each completed mission or disavowed agent in combat, you gain a rogue level and unlock a new perk to distribute the attributes.

Be the last alive in the world.

Good Luck Rogue Agents!

data.short_description: The Deep State is under attack. You have been invited to join this mission!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.6Ghz+ or faster x32-compatible processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 95 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game is a simulation . Its goal is to provide fun. Any resemblance with reality, is mere coincidence.
